1:
With my voice I cry out for help to Yahweh;\q with my voice I plead for Yahweh's favor.
\q
2:
I pour out my lament before him;\q I tell him my troubles.


\q
3:
When my spirit is weak within me,\q you know my path.
\q In the way that I walk
\q they have hidden a trap for me.
\q
4:
I look to my right and and see\q that there is no one who cares about me.
\q There is no escape for me;
\q no one cares about my life.
\q
5:
I called out to you, Yahweh;\q I said, "You are my refuge,
\q my portion in the land of the living.


\q
6:
Listen to my call,\q for I have been brought very low;
\q rescue me from my persecutors,
\q for they are stronger than I.
\q
7:
Bring my soul out of prison\q so that I may give thanks to your name.
\q The righteous will gather around me
\q because you have been good to me."
